Uses of Class
TowerDefense.Tile

    • Uses of Tile in TowerDefense

      Methods in TowerDefense that return Tile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Tile Grid.getClickedTile()
      If a Tile was clicked by the user since the last update, returns that Tile.
      Tile Tile.getDown() 
      Tile Tile.getLeft() 
      Tile Tile.getRight() 
      Tile Tower.getTile()
      Return the Tile this Tower is occupying.
      Tile Grid.getTile(int column, int row) 
      Tile Tile.getTileTo(Direction direction)
      Returns the tile in the corresponding direction of this one.
      Tile Tile.getUp() 
      Methods in TowerDefense with parameters of type Tile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Smoke.activate(Tile destination)
      Translates this Tower to a specific Tile.
      boolean SetOfTowers.addTowerAt(Tile tile)
      Creates a new tower (a Medic) at the corresponding tile and stores it in this set.
      boolean SetOfTowers.addTowerAt(Tile tile, boolean towerIsMedic)
      Creates a new tower at the corresponding tile and stores it in this set.
      boolean Tile.connectWithDown(Tile downTile)
      Connects this Tile to another Tile; the other Tile will be below this Tile, and this Tile will be above the other Tile.
      boolean Tile.connectWithLeft(Tile leftTile)
      Connects this Tile to another Tile; the other Tile will be on this Tile's left, and this Tile will be on the other Tile's right.
      boolean Tower.setTile(Tile newTile)
      Puts this Tower at a specific Tile, instantaneously.
      boolean Tower.teleportTo(Tile newTile)
      Moves this Tower to a specific Tile via in-game movement.
